lines.text:
[singing]
Oh, people call me Daffy. They think that I am goony. Ah, just because I'm happy is no sign I'm looney tooney. Oh, when they say I'm nutsy. It sure gives me a pain. Please pass the ketchup, I think its going to rain. Oh, you can't bounce a meatball. Though try with all your might. Ah, turn on the radio, I want to fly a kite. Good evening, friends.
[Porky is painting a lake]
Lake?
Mmm-hmm.
That lake?
Mmm-hmm.
That's my lake.
Mmm-hmm.
You can't go around painting other people's property! At least have the decency to ask me if you can paint it!
Okay, may I please paint your lake?
No. I don't want my lake painted.
[Daffy wipes it off of Porky's painting, with a cloth]
The mountains are okay, I don't own them.
[Daffy leaves Porky, just temporarily]

[angrily]
Ooh!

[Daffy returns, dressed in an old man's clothes]
Hey there, sonny.
And who are you?
I'm the old man of the mountains!
[Daffy then wipes the mountains off of Porky's painting]
And I don't want them painted!

[Porky rips the disguise off of Daffy]
You wait here, I've got something for you.
[Porky then laughs diabolically, after this remark]
I like him, he's crazy!
There ought to be a law against crazy ducks!
Hunting ducks out of season, eh? That goes tough on you around these parts. Executioner! Oh, executioner!
[Daffy walks off screen and returns, wearing an executioner's black hood & brandishing an ax]

[Porky lays his neck on the chopping block]
Gosh, they're sure strict around here.
Have you a marriage license?
G-g-gosh no, I'm not married.
Aha! Not married eh? Well,uh
[jumps into Porky's arms]
whaddya say you and me go steady?
Captain John Smith marry-um Pocahontas, raise-um little poker chips.

[Porky always stutters, as he begins to speak. He threw a rock at Daffy]
T-Take that, you w-web-footed maniac!

[Daffy is wearing a catcher's uniform, he catches the rock]
Right over the middle! That's a-pitching 'em!
[Daffy throws the rock back to Porky]
He's stealing second! Cover the bag! Here he comes! Tag 'im!
[Porky catches the rock as Daffy slides below him]

[Daffy pushes Porky until he starts to run]
Steal home, DiMaggio! It means the game! Atta boy, DiMaggio! Hit the dirt! Slide, DiMaggio, slide!

[sliding]
Hey! What am I sliding for? I'm not DiMaggio. My name's m-m-m...
[Porky then slides into a mud puddle]
...Mud.
[Porky is using Daffy as his car motor & closing lines, also]
He's got no right to do this to me!
[a license permit quickly pops up, it reads "Porky Pig's Permit to use Daffy Duck as motor"]
What a revolting development this is.
When I get to California, I'll have his valves crowned.
[closing line & remark, before Closing Credits' sign appears]
